data.meta_description: View information concerning scholarship opportunities at Baylor College of Medicine....
data.text:
Applications for SOM scholarships are no longer being accepted for the 2024-2025 school year.

The applications for the scholarships listed below will be reviewed by the School of Medicine Scholarship Committee. Students must apply using the 2024-2025 Scholarship application.

There are two scholarship applications available for students to apply. One for merit and another for merit-based with a need component. Should you wish to apply for scholarships in both categories, please access both applications.

We want to support you in exploring external scholarship opportunities that may be available. Please be aware that Baylor College of Medicine is not responsible for, nor affiliated with, the following external resources. However, we encourage you to consider these scholarship opportunities as potential avenues for financial support during your medical education.

It is important to carefully review the terms and conditions of each scholarship, as well as the legitimacy of the sponsoring organization. Baylor College of Medicine does not endorse or guarantee the accuracy of information provided by external scholarship sources.

If you decide to apply for any external scholarships, please do so with due diligence and ensure that you comply with all application requirements and deadlines.

For your convenience, we have compiled a list of external scholarship opportunities that you may explore. Please note that this list is not exhaustive, and there may be other opportunities available:
